Detailed Description

Request for expanding a RouteReply containing lists of IDs to string and/or coordinates.

Definition at line 30 of file ExpandRouteRequest.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ExpandRouteRequest::ExpandRouteRequest (  uint32  requestID,
RouteReplyPacket *  routeReply,
uint32  expandRouteType,
StringTable::languageCode  language = StringTable::ENGLISH,
bool  abbreviate = true,
bool  landmarks = false,
bool  removeAhead = false,
bool  nameChangeWP = false
) 
 

Create new expand route request.

Parameters:
requestID The ID of the request.
routeReply The RouteReply to expand.
expandRouteType What types of data to be included in the answer.
language The prefered language, default ENGLISH.
abbreviate If roadnames should be abbreviated.
landmarks Should landmarks be added to the result.
removeAhead Should Aheads be removed if roadname differs?
nameChangeWP Should road name change force a waypoint?

Delates all allocated data.
